title: "Riot are balancing around world on the next patch"
body:
weird, i can't find {{champion:84}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:136}} {{champion:268}} (no longer picked){{champion:2}} {{champion:23}}  and so much champions not picked since only about 50 are picked on 130.

instead, let's buff {{champion:67}} {{champion:412}}  who are already picked in lcs kappa

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sotere,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ena0vbmi,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-08-16T20:58:03.978+0000)
>
> Well, I wouldn't say massive...

why would you guys buff orianna
Bc lulu and Karna crowd her out of'solo lane utility mage' but she can't go bot

Becasue she has to be viable for worlds ever freaking year.

And she always appears out of nowhere for worlds every freaking year.

I was hoping to not see her this year but I guess not.
she has -10 cd mana+ cost reduced on her ulti i think, i don't really how it's going to change anything since {{champion:112}}  brings as much utility and more damage.
Well, Viktor always has the upper hand anyways.

> [{quoted}](name=Sona x Rubick,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ena0vbmi,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2016-08-16T21:09:54.560+0000)
>
> she has -10 cd mana+ cost reduced on her ulti i think, i don't really how it's going to change anything since {{champion:112}}  brings as much utility and more damage.

Viktor doesn't really bring more utility, though. 

I mean, I play both of them a lot and Viktor's definitely better right now, but Orianna's ult has the potential to turn games around in a way that Viktor just doesn't really do.

Akali? Buffs? HAHAHA. Olaf? Buffs? HAHAHA. Trynd? Buffs? FFS please no.

I see those champs played all the time. The only one i dont see anymore is Aatrox and Sol. The rest are deal insane damage, and dont need a buff at all.
he is talking about lcs, not your games.

{{champion:2}} regularly shows up in the EU LCS, he's in fine shape for Worlds.

The danger with the worlds patch is if you make them too strong they end up pick-ban (see Gangplank last year). Any change to {{champion:84}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:136}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:23}} that made them a *consideration* would be making them too strong.

Those champions need more time and attention than they'll be able to get before worlds.
Additionally, Aurelion Sol is already strong enough - her merely has a weird playstyle that rewards teams that can properly play around him (Korean KT, for example).
Olaf is picked a lot... He's always picked when sivir is strong
Very true.Bad balance team.Buff Diana but no buff Aatrox.
Weird. I can't understand why a champion that is countered by a 75G item isn't picked.
